home.whoAmI:
My name is **Boris Laporte**, I am a French full-stack developer based in Paris.
I'm a fourth year student at Hetic.
home.status:
I love traveling around the world and I'm **looking for a 6 months internship** anywhere.
(july to december)

projects.name: Ronan Polin
projects.title: Ronan Polin's portfolio
projects.desc:
This is my friend Ronan Polin's new portfolio,
it was a real pleasure to work with him on this.
Go check out his works ! He's good at what he does.

projects.name: Lipsty
projects.title: Absolutely flirty
projects.desc:
How to make an application about cocktails
that won't be the same than the others ?
Mix seduction and cocktail recipes and you get Lipsty !

projects.name: Claude Shannon
projects.title: The world in binary
projects.desc:
In the honor of Claude Shannon's 100th birthday.
The CNRS asked us to make a website tracing
the most important parts of his life.

projects.name: Timokids
projects.title: An educational app for children
projects.desc:
When I was in Internship with Timokids, I had
several missions revelant to their website. After a little study,
I advised them that it would be better to make a new one,
more maintainable for future modification and while I was at it,
make a new design while taking account for the SEO.

projects.name: TribuCancer
projects.title: Together we are stronger
projects.desc:
Made for the association of the same name.
Its goal, is to help the sick and their relatives
to live better with the decease.

projects.name: Geek-Art
projects.title: The alphabet of Geek-Art
projects.desc:
"L'alphabet du Geek-Art", which includes many
artists and some of their works in alphabetical order.
